import { BiGlobe, BiImage, BiLike, BiRepost, BiSmile, BiSortDown, BiX } from 'react-icons/bi'; import './Post.css'; import { CgComment } from 'react-icons/cg'; import { BsSend, BsThreeDots } from 'react-icons/bs'; import Profile from '../assets/profile.jpeg'; import { useState } from 'react'; import LikeAction from '../assets/like-hover/like.svg'; import IdeaAction from '../assets/like-hover/idea.svg'; import LoveAction from '../assets/like-hover/love.svg'; import SupportAction from '../assets/like-hover/support.svg'; import FunnyAction from '../assets/like-hover/Funny.svg'; import axiosInstance from '../api/axiosInstance'; const Post = () => { const [commentFocus, setCommentFocus] = useState(false); const [openComment, setOpenComment] = useState(false); const [myPosts, setMyPosts] = useState([]) useState(() => { const fetchPosts = async() => { const res = await axiosInstance('/posts'); setMyPosts(res.data); }; fetchPosts(); },[]); const CommentOpen = () => { setOpenComment(true); } if(!myPosts){ return('Loading...') } return (
{/* Post Header */}

22m •
{myPosts.caption}
{/* Post Content */}
{myPosts.mediaType === 'image' ? : }
{/* Post Footer */}

{myPosts.posts?.comments || 'null'} comments

{/* Comment post */}

{/* Repost post */}

{/* Send post */}

{/* post Comments */} {openComment &&
Good Luck!

Great service
Cool View!

{/* Comments */}
Most relevant
{/* comments for the post */} {myPosts.comments?.map((comment, index) => (
{comment.user.name}

{comment.user.bio}

2d
{/* comment content */}

{comment.comment.replies}
))}
}
); } export default Post;
